title: Describing the Values
text: To describe the values, $$x$$, included in the intervals shown, we would say, “x is a real number greater than or equal to $$1$$ and less than or equal to $$3$$, or a real number greater than 5.”

title: Defining Set-Builder Notation
text: The set-buidler notation takes the form {x|statement about x}, which is read as, “the set of all $$x$$ such that the statement about $$x$$ is true.”

title: Translate to Math Notation
text: The above statement, translated into set-builder notation, is {$$x|1 \leq x \leq 3$$ or $$x>5$$.}
